headline: Madison Cawthorn Caught Trying to Bring a Gun Through Airport Security  Again
author: Ryan Bort
sentences: Transportation Security Administration found the gun  a loaded Staccato 9mm handgun  at a security checkpoint around 9 a.m. and called the police, who gave Cawthorn a criminal misdemeanor citation for possessing a dangerous weapon on city property.
